about_the_game:
Extend your journey in the world of "Unsolved Case: Above the Law" with this thrilling DLC that brings even more challenges and mysteries to solve! Discover new locations, unravel additional details about the characters, and unlock secrets that could turn the entire case around. It's a treasure trove of puzzles, hidden objects, and mind-bending mini-games!
This additional content includes four new locations! You'll get to visit the large police archive, as well as explore the session room where you're sure to find something that can clear things up for you! There's also a lot waiting for you in the museum at the fair and the performer's stash!

Gain exclusive access to various unexplored areas. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

♟️ VISIT THE BIG POLICE ARCHIVE!
Search through desks, large cabinets, and evidence boxes filled with potential clues hidden among countless files and books.

♟️ SEARCH THE SPIRIT ROOM!
Step into a mysterious and eerie room where the supernatural meets the investigative, filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered.

♟️ EXPLORE THE FORBIDDEN LABORATORY!
Examine complex gadgets and elusive clues in a place where forbidden experiments hide the truth.

♟️ COME TO THE SECRET ROOM!
Discover a dusty collection of books, an ancient fireplace, and a secretive desk setup that could reveal the ultimate secrets of the case.

Challenge yourself to find hidden objects across the new extended environments. Each location is filled with detailed and interactive scenes!
